Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Cicero
ShortDescription: EB 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
